item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)

item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add
